__e: Hmm, actually, it was me who got him home alive, but the point is, he would never abandon you.
- I would. I would let you talk to her right now, but she's got this thing in her mouth.
And maybe you were just doing it to be a friend but I would never let you do that.
I would not let anything bad happen to her , you know.
If I had to do it over again, I'd make sure she never left me.
You know the reason I think... I told him about us in the first place is that somewhere inside, I was hoping he would leave me and that you would come, and everything would be all right.
I don't understand what kind of mother would leave her kid in a car...
That... that he was gonna leave his wife and his kid for you?
But if I'm her, I'm not leaving this city - without the one thing I want.
So, why would she let her husband go home in the middle of it?
He would never leave me his car.
I thought, that you'd never give up your work for anyone.
You didn't really think that I'd stop being your friend just because you...
- I couldn't give up being a cop, and I never figured out how to have both, so...
And if I were, I'd give it up for you.
He wouldn't leave me and the baby for this long.
You rode the horse. And if I could do that, there's no way I wasn't gonna do this.
He'd stop being there for me - until the day he actually wasn't.
Is there a part of you that thinks for one minute that I'd let one of my friends die just so I could come back to life?

You know, I'm just some guy, you know, "Why should he get some guy in?"
